details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.3.3 Composite fonts - Registry and Ordering
details.description: For any given composite (Type 0) font referenced within a conforming file, the CIDSystemInfo entries of its CIDFont and CMap dictionaries shall be compatible

rule.description: For any given composite (Type 0) font referenced within a conforming file, the CIDSystemInfo entries of its CIDFont and CMap dictionaries shall be compatible

error.message: Registry and Ordering entries in the CIDFont and CMap dictionaries of a Type 0 font are not compatible
